creditline: Gift of Rani Halpern and Joel Green
description: Sewn booklet with cream colored paper covers; reproduction of images from artist's book at center of pages, with biblical translations on left and artist's comments on right; label in LRC on cover
medium: Color inkjet prints, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Rani Halpern and Joel Green, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
title: Translation with Artist's Comments for "Genesis Twenty-Two: The Binding of Isaac"
